description: Welcome to an exceptional opportunity in the highly sought-after Sommerville Gardens community. This beautifully maintained 3-bedroom, 3-bathroom, two-story townhome offers the perfect blend of comfort, space, and value for today’s family buyer. Step inside to find newer carpeting, timeless real hardwood flooring, and a bright, well-designed layout that feels instantly like home. The spacious kitchen and living area flow seamlessly to a large, private backyard—an ideal setting for family gatherings, outdoor entertaining, or simply unwinding in your own peaceful retreat. Located just a short walk from Thomas Haney Secondary and Golden Ears Elementary, this home delivers unbeatable convenience in a safe, family-friendly neighborhood. Move-in ready, thoughtfully updated, and priced to impress
